detailsData.title: Personalized Attention
detailsData.content: We pride ourselves in our exceptional level of communication and responsiveness to our clients and their needs. You will not wait weeks for a return call or an email response as a Tenge Law Firm, LLC client.

detailsData.title: Expert Representation
detailsData.content: J. Todd Tenge has been practicing personal injury law for over 30 years, with a reputation as one of the premier personal injury attorneys in Colorado.

detailsData.title: High Client Satisfaction
detailsData.content: Our approach to handling cases and taking care of clients has led to exceedingly high client satisfaction, with many cases coming from personal referrals.

detailsData.title: Over $50M Recovered
detailsData.content: In the last ten years, we’ve recovered $50 million on behalf of our clients. Our motto is simple – You do what you need to do to physically recover, and we’ll handle the rest.

valueProp: No one ever wants to hire a personal injury lawyer. When folks call us it’s because they have experienced something truly terrible. At the Tenge Law Firm, we feel a profound responsibility to ensure our client’s physical and emotional well being during one of the worst times of their life. And that means being more than just an attorney. It means being a confidant, an advocate, a sympathetic ear, and a friend. If you have suffered the unimaginable, we hope you’ll reach out to us to discuss your case. Even if we can’t represent you in a lawsuit, we will offer you guidance on your best possible path forward.

testimonalData.text: This firm is truly interested in helping people... Asia N. Via Google Car Accident
testimonalData.author: Asia N.
